subject: ALL Activity Endpoints LIVE on TEST
body:
Dash,

All three Activity Screen endpoints are now live on TEST.

**NEW ENDPOINTS:**

1. **GET /api/analytics/login-history**
   Collection: UserLoginHistory
   Fields: firebaseUserId, appId, timestamp, ip, deviceType, location, dayOfWeek, hourOfDay

2. **GET /api/analytics/visitor-history**
   Collection: VisitorTrackingHistory
   Fields: visitorId, appId, timestamp, ip, page, deviceType, location, dayOfWeek, hourOfDay

3. **GET /api/analytics/map-center-history**
   Collection: MapCenterHistory
   Fields: firebaseUserId, appId, timestamp, ip, page, mapCenter{lat,lng}, deviceType, userLocation

**COMMON QUERY PARAMS (all endpoints):**
- page: Page number (default: 0)
- limit: Items per page (default: 50, max: 200)
- range: Time filter - 1H, 24H, 7D, 1M, 3M, 6M, 1Yr, All (default: 7D)
- appId: 1=TangoTiempo, 2=HarmonyJunction
- deviceType: mobile, tablet, desktop

**RESPONSE FORMAT:**
```json
{
  "success": true,
  "data": [...],
  "pagination": { "page": 0, "limit": 50, "total": 123, "pages": 3 },
  "filters": { "range": "7D", "appId": null, "deviceType": null }
}
```

**TEST URLs:**
- https://calendarbeaf-test.azurewebsites.net/api/analytics/login-history?range=7D
- https://calendarbeaf-test.azurewebsites.net/api/analytics/visitor-history?range=7D
- https://calendarbeaf-test.azurewebsites.net/api/analytics/map-center-history?range=7D

You're unblocked for the Activity Screen!

- Fulton
